name: Pebble Way
description:
In the game Pebble Way you have to help the pebble to reach the target without getting caught by the enemy pebbles.

Think over your every step, calculate your actions several moves ahead.

Stuck? No problem :) You can always use the hint.

The game has three modes with different rules for moving enemies:

- Routes - enemies  move along looped routes;

- Chasing - enemies are chasing the player, trying to minimize the distance to him;

- Mirror - enemies move in the opposite direction to the player's movement.

Each mode consists of many levels of different sizes and difficulty.

You can always run any level at any time.

Also in the game you will find cute minimalistic graphics and pleasant melodic music.
